UPDATE_ORGANIZATION_PROFILE.label: Update Organization Profile
UPDATE_ORGANIZATION_PROFILE.description: Description of the organization <inlineLink>{{organizationName}}</inlineLink> has been modified.

CREATE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.label: Create Organization Structure
CREATE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.branch: A branch has been created under the name <inlineLink>{{organizationStructureName}}</inlineLink>.
CREATE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.role: The role has been created with the name <inlineLink>{{organizationStructureName}}</inlineLink>.

UPDATE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.label: Update Organization Structure
UPDATE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.branch: Changed the name of the branch from {{organizationStructureNameInitial}} to <inlineLink>{{organizationStructureNameFinal}}</inlineLink>.
UPDATE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.department: Changed the name of the department from {{organizationStructureNameInitial}} to <inlineLink>{{organizationStructureNameFinal}}</inlineLink>.

DELETE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.label: Delete Organization Structure
DELETE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.branch: The branch named {{organizationStructureName}} has been deleted.
DELETE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.department: The department named {{organizationStructureName}} has been deleted.
DELETE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE.role: The role named {{organizationStructureName}} has been deleted.

APPROVE_ACCESS_REQUEST.label: Approve Access Request
APPROVE_ACCESS_REQUEST.description: Request for access for the volunteer <inlineLink>{{userName}}</inlineLink> has been approved.

REJECT_ACCESS_REQUEST.label: Reject Access Request
REJECT_ACCESS_REQUEST.description: The access request for the user {{userName}} was rejected.

DELETE_ACCESS_REQUEST.label: Delete Access Request
DELETE_ACCESS_REQUEST.description: The access request for the user {{userName}} has been deleted.

CHANGE_VOLUNTEER_STATUS.label: Change Volunteer Status
CHANGE_VOLUNTEER_STATUS.description: Status for the volunteer <inlineLink>{{volunteerName}}</inlineLink> has been changed from {{oldStatus}} to {{newStatus}}.

CHANGE_ACTIVITY_LOG_STATUS.label: Change Activity Log Status
CHANGE_ACTIVITY_LOG_STATUS.rejected: Volunteer hours for <inlineLink>{{volunteerName}}</inlineLink> have been rejected
CHANGE_ACTIVITY_LOG_STATUS.approved: Volunteer hours for <inlineLink>{{volunteerName}}</inlineLink> have been approved

CREATE_ACTIVITY_TYPE.label: Create Activity Type
CREATE_ACTIVITY_TYPE.description: Category of activity <inlineLink>{{activityTypeName}}</inlineLink> has been created.

UPDATE_ACTIVITY_TYPE.label: Update Activity Type
UPDATE_ACTIVITY_TYPE.description: Category of activity <inlineLink>{{activityTypeName}}</inlineLink> has been modified.

CHANGE_ACTIVITY_TYPE_STATUS.label: Change Activity Type Status
CHANGE_ACTIVITY_TYPE_STATUS.description: Activity category status <inlineLink>{{activityTypeName}}</inlineLink> has been changed from {{oldStatus}} to {{newStatus}}.

CHANGE_EVENT_STATUS.label: Change Event Status
CHANGE_EVENT_STATUS.description: Event status for <inlineLink>{{eventName}}</inlineLink> has been changed from {{oldStatus}} to {{newStatus}}.

CREATE_CONTRACT.label: Generate Contract
CREATE_CONTRACT.description: A new contract has been generated for volunteer <inlineLink>{{volunteerName}}</inlineLink>

APPROVE_CONTRACT.label: Approve Contract
APPROVE_CONTRACT.description: Contract number <inlineContractLink>{{contractNumber}}</inlineContractLink> for <inlineLink>{{volunteerName}}</inlineLink> has been approved

REJECT_CONTRACT.label: Reject Contract
REJECT_CONTRACT.description: Contract number <inlineContractLink>{{contractNumber}}</inlineContractLink> for <inlineLink>{{volunteerName}}</inlineLink> has been rejected

documents.title: Volunteer contracts
documents.description: View the list of all your volunteer contracts in VIC. The volunteer contract has a predefined structure. You can create multiple contract templates (e.g. volunteer contract >16 years, volunteer contract <16 years).

modal.content: This action will permanently delete the template and all information associated with it.
